name: flimnei
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c1), csn(c0)))), wcel(c3, c2))

stmt.origin: sselda(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c1), csn(c0)), c2, wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c1), csn(c0)))), wcel(c3, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, c1), csn(c0)), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c1), csn(c0)))), wcel(c3, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, c1), csn(c0)), c2))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, c1), csn(c0)), c2))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c1), csn(c0)))), wcel(c3, c2))

comment: A filter contains all of the neighborhoods of its limit points. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 4-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2015.)
